typedef Integral_Constant<bool, false> False_Type
Boolean (false) version of Integral_Constant.
T first
The “T” member which you can access / set.
template<typename T, T v> struct Integral_Constant { static const T value = v; typedef T value_type; typedef Integral_Constant<T, v> type; }
Compile time integral constant.
template<typename T> struct Is_Empty: Integral_Constant<bool, Is_Empty_Impl<T>::value> {}
Checks whether a given structure is empty.
template<typename, typename> struct Is_Equal { enum { value = 0 }; }
Checks whether two types are equal.
template<typename T> struct Is_Floating_Point: False_Type {}
Version of Bool_Type for floating point types.
template<typename T> struct Is_Integral: False_Type {}
Version of Bool_Type for integral types.
template<typename T> struct Is_POD: Integral_Constant<bool, ( Is_Integral <T>::value || Is_Floating_Point<T>::value || Is_Pointer <T>::value )> {}
Version of Integral_Constant for POD types.
template<typename T> struct Is_Pointer: False_Type {}
Version of Bool_Type for pointer types.
enum { MIN_SIZE = 8 }
The minimal amount of elements to reserve space for when creating the buffer.
template<typename T> struct MT_Base {}
A base struct for the Mersenne Twister class.
static Nil nil
The “nil” value that can be assigned as table member etc.
struct Nil {}
An empty structure you don’t usually make instances of, the only (singleton) instance is nil.
template<typename T> struct Remove_Reference { typedef T type; }
Makes non-reference type from type.
U second
The “U” member which you can access / set.
template<typename T> struct String_Base {}
A base struct for string class.
